tiles.name: crag_peak_summit
tiles.description: The highest point of the Whispering Crags, perpetually wreathed in mist and echoing with the memory of ancient Storm Kings.

tiles.name: zephyrs_hidden_cave
tiles.description: The entrance to Zephyr's hidden laboratory, carved into the mountainside. Visible only to those who know where to look.

tiles.name: storm_valley_floor
tiles.description: The valley below the Crags, frequently struck by sudden and violent thunderstorms. The air crackles with latent energy.

tiles.name: ancient_storm_altar
tiles.description: A crumbling stone altar, once used by the Storm Kings for weather manipulation rituals. Now, a ruin haunted by echoes of power.

tiles.name: hermetic_order_ruins
tiles.description: The remains of the hermetic order's monastery, where Zephyr learned the elemental arts. Partially destroyed by a lightning strike years ago.

tiles.name: skyfire_river_source
tiles.description: The source of the Skyfire River, fed by glacial meltwater and said to have healing properties. Revered by the local villages.

tiles.name: cragside_fishing_village
tiles.description: A small village nestled at the foot of the Crags, known for its hardy fishermen and their knowledge of the mountain weather.

tiles.name: windswept_farmlands
tiles.description: Terraced farmlands clinging to the hillsides, their crops struggling against the harsh winds and unpredictable storms.

tiles.name: broken_lightning_bridge
tiles.description: A shattered bridge, once a vital trade route. Destroyed during the Great Tempest, now a treacherous crossing.

tiles.name: abandoned_weather_station
tiles.description: A disused weather station, built by the Storm Kings to predict and control storms. Now overgrown and haunted by whispers of the past.

tiles.name: echoing_canyon
tiles.description: A deep canyon known for its strange acoustics, where the wind carries whispers of forgotten languages and ancient prophecies.

tiles.name: storm_scarred_forest
tiles.description: A forest bearing the marks of countless lightning strikes, with charred trees and an eerie silence.

tiles.name: mineral_rich_mines
tiles.description: A mine known for its unique minerals, used in crafting powerful lightning-based artifacts.

tiles.name: ancient_watcher_tower
tiles.description: A ruined tower, built to watch for approaching storms and warn the populace. Now a haven for bandits and wild creatures.

tiles.name: skyfire_river_bend
tiles.description: A sharp bend in the Skyfire River, where the water flows swiftly and powerfully. Home to rare fish and dangerous currents.

tiles.name: hidden_druid_grove
tiles.description: A secluded grove, where druids once communed with the spirits of the storm. Now a place of quiet reflection and natural power.

tiles.name: pilgrim_trail_entrance
tiles.description: The start of a trail leading to a holy site atop the mountains, attracting pilgrims seeking enlightenment and spiritual strength.

tiles.name: windswept_wheat_fields
tiles.description: Vast wheat fields that stretch as far as the eye can see. These fields are often affected by lightning strikes, which affects the crops

tiles.name: thunderclap_gorge
tiles.description: A steep gorge prone to thunderclaps that echo throughout the region. It is a beautiful yet very dangerous region.

tiles.name: isolated_sheep_herding_camp
tiles.description: An isolated camp for sheep herders. This area is frequently affected by the whims of the mountain weather.

tiles.name: cragside_quarry
tiles.description: The quarry provides stone for many villages. It is a site where many workers work to obtain materials from the Crags.

tiles.name: abandoned_logging_camp
tiles.description: A site where many lumberjacks cut lumber for wood. This logging camp was abandoned after too many lightning strikes.

tiles.name: ruined_elemental_academy
tiles.description: Once a center of learning for elemental magic. This structure was destroyed during the Great Tempest, causing untold damage.

tiles.name: ancient_gargoyle_statue
tiles.description: This statue is very worn, but remains as a lasting monument to the past.

tiles.name: overlook_of_broken_city
tiles.description: The city below fell to ruin after the Great Tempest. The area is plagued by storms and bandits.

tiles.name: shrine_to_skyfire
tiles.description: This shrine brings spiritual enlightenment to pilgrims seeking spiritual strength.

tiles.name: desolate_watchtower
tiles.description: This watchtower sits abandoned and desolated. It overlooks many zones around the crags, offering a vantage point.

tiles.name: bandit_hideout
tiles.description: This hideout is home to many bandits. The bandits harass local populations and create trouble.

tiles.name: small_farming_town
tiles.description: This town is home to many farmers. They help to feed local populations with their agriculture.

tiles.name: skyfire_tavern
tiles.description: The tavern serves food and ale to weary travelers.

tiles.name: cragside_trading_outpost
tiles.description: Traders arrive to sell and trade exotic wares and materials. They come from far and wide to visit the crags.

tiles.name: temple_to_storm_kings
tiles.description: This temple pays tribute to the storm kings.

tiles.name: ancient_magical_barrier
tiles.description: A magical barrier protects the region from storms.

tiles.name: haunted_meteorite_crater
tiles.description: A crater where a meteorite crashed long ago. The area is now haunted.

tiles.name: secret_underground_lab
tiles.description: An underground lab where secrets abound and are hidden.

tiles.name: abandoned_military_fort
tiles.description: Long ago, the military resided here. It now sits desolated.

tiles.name: forgotten_graveyard
tiles.description: A lost and forgotten graveyard.

tiles.name: warlock_lair
tiles.description: An evil warlock lurks here.

tiles.name: monster_infested_caverns
tiles.description: These caverns are home to monsters. Only the brave travel here.

tiles.name: ancient_ruins
tiles.description: Remnants of the past remind the present of what came before.

tiles.name: cragside_prison
tiles.description: A prison for criminals and ne'er-do-wells.

tiles.name: library_of_secrets
tiles.description: This library contains tomes and forbidden texts from the past.

tiles.name: ancient_treasure_vault
tiles.description: A chamber full of gold and treasure. It is a very dangerous place.

tiles.name: desecrated_chapel
tiles.description: This chapel was once holy, now it is desecrated and profane.

tiles.name: dragon_lair
tiles.description: A lair of a sleeping dragon.

tiles.name: ancient_battlefield
tiles.description: A battlefield where many fought and died long ago.

tiles.name: cragside_armory
tiles.description: A site where weapons are forged.

tiles.name: magical_shop
tiles.description: A shop to buy and sell rare materials.

tiles.name: elemental_conflux
tiles.description: A convergence of the elements creates strange effects.

tiles.name: monk_sanctuary
tiles.description: A sanctuary for monks to meditate.

tiles.name: hidden_elven_city
tiles.description: The elves reside here.

tiles.name: dwarven_outpost
tiles.description: The dwarves sell their wares here.

tiles.name: halfling_farms
tiles.description: The halflings farm the fields and raise animals.

tiles.name: gnomish_town
tiles.description: The gnomes reside here.

tiles.name: undead_infested_town
tiles.description: A town besieged by the undead.

tiles.name: ogre_camp
tiles.description: The ogres reside in this camp.

tiles.name: goblin_village
tiles.description: Goblins gather here.

tiles.name: kobold_campsite
tiles.description: Kobolds plot and plan in this area.

tiles.name: lizardfolk_swamp
tiles.description: The lizardfolk lie in wait here.

tiles.name: murloc_fishing_hole
tiles.description: Murlocs fish for their food here.

tiles.name: quarryside_traveler_camp
tiles.description: A camp to rest and sell supplies before continuing their trip.

tiles.name: ancient_skyfire_battery
tiles.description: An artifact that once manipulated the weather.

tiles.name: flooded_fishing_village
tiles.description: Devastated by the Skyfire River.

tiles.name: highway_to_distant_lands
tiles.description: A highway to travel to new locations.

tiles.name: old_railway_station
tiles.description: A railway station that services local cities.

tiles.name: ancient_airfield
tiles.description: An airfield to launch and land planes.

tiles.name: docks_for_sailors
tiles.description: A place for sailors to rest and reload cargo.

tiles.name: skyfire_river_delta
tiles.description: The delta of the river.

tiles.name: cragside_industrial_complex
tiles.description: An area of industry.

tiles.name: central_cragside
tiles.description: A large city.

tiles.name: suburban_residential
tiles.description: Residential area.

tiles.name: market_square
tiles.description: A square where merchants trade and sell.

tiles.name: downtown_district
tiles.description: The downtown part of the city.

tiles.name: financial_district
tiles.description: The banks are here.

tiles.name: commercial_center
tiles.description: An area for the commerce.

tiles.name: government_district
tiles.description: An area for the government.

tiles.name: entertainment_zone
tiles.description: For leisure and entertainment.

tiles.name: historical_museum
tiles.description: To learn about the past.

tiles.name: university
tiles.description: A learning facility.

tiles.name: central_hospital
tiles.description: For medical care.

tiles.name: cragside_park
tiles.description: A park for leisure activities.

tiles.name: cragside_beach
tiles.description: A sandy coastline.

tiles.name: military_training_facility
tiles.description: To practice combat.

tiles.name: shopping_mall
tiles.description: Shopping and commerce.

tiles.name: residential_suburb
tiles.description: Suburbs with residences.

tiles.name: school
tiles.description: An elementary school.

tiles.name: restaurant
tiles.description: A place to eat.

tiles.name: apartment_complex
tiles.description: An apartment complex.

tiles.name: farm_fields
tiles.description: Fields to farm.

tiles.name: forested_woodland
tiles.description: An area full of trees.

tiles.name: river_valley
tiles.description: A valley where the Skyfire River flows through.

tiles.name: mountain_ridge
tiles.description: A mountain ridge line.

tiles.name: cave_system
tiles.description: A system of caves.

tiles.name: mountain_pass
tiles.description: A mountain pass to travel through.

tiles.name: hilltop_viewpoint
tiles.description: A hill to overlook the cities.

tiles.name: lake
tiles.description: A large body of water.

tiles.name: abandoned_cabin
tiles.description: An abandoned cabin.

tiles.name: crater
tiles.description: A large impact crater.

tiles.name: cemetery
tiles.description: A graveyard.

tiles.name: small_lake_town
tiles.description: Town next to a beautiful lake.
